Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Radar display intermittent blanking. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Communication Suite component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 17/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy
